attributes.action: make women's sanitary products tax free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every month women spend up to £10 (sometimes more) on sanitary products.  These are not a luxury, they are a neccessity. 

If sanitary products were tax free they would be on average 40p cheaper, which may not seem like a lot, but it all adds up and why should we pay more than we have to for something that we need to buy?
